name: The Fool
description:
The first and last card of the Marselha tarot deck.
It represents courage, the beginning of a journey. It is the card that tell you to be an idiot and do it, to purchase your dreams and reach your goals, even when you have nothing and are walking on a tightrope.
To become the magician and start manifesting your reality, you have to first accept the role as a fool. Accept that the better way to know everything is to first know nothing. Let every being be your teacher, work and cocreate the person you are on this journey, at this lifetime. It may seem like, but the fool is not alone. None of us.
Put on a show, the Universe is watching you.

size: [2480×3508]

Last painting of 2021

Background: Pillars of Creation, the birth of a star, with RGB shift, photo by Hubble.
[M16—Eagle Nebula Pillars at 4.1.1995]

It has been an amazing year, thank you!
